languages.text: В начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цель получает ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальность{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающего{/g} урона, который игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} урона.

At the beginning of each of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, they will suffer ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, which ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
languages.original_text: В начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} цель получает ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальность{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}раздирающего{/g} урона, который игнорирует {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} урона.

traits.locale_text: At the beginning of each of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, they will suffer <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, which ignores {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

At the beginning of each of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, they will suffer ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, which ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

At the beginning of each of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, they will suffer ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, which ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

languages.text: Zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Ziels erleidet es ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Letalität{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rüstungsbrechenden Schaden{/g}, der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} ignoriert.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of each of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, they will suffer ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, which ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Ziels erleidet es <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethalität{/g} /10)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rüstungsbrechenden Schaden{/g}, der {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}.

languages.text: Au début de chacun de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g}, la cible subit ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}létalité{/g} / 10) points de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts de lacération{/g}, ce qui l'empêche de bénéficier de la protection conférée par son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of each of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, they will suffer ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, which ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Au début de chacun de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g}, la cible subit <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}létalité{/g} / 10)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}dégâts perforants{/g}, ce qui l'empêche de bénéficier de la protection conférée par son {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}.

languages.text: 目标每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，受到（{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}/10）点{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}，此伤害无视{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of each of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, they will suffer ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, which ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 目标每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，受到<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}/10）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}撕裂伤害{/g}，此伤害无视{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}。

languages.text: Al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del objetivo, le inflige ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}letalidad{/g} / 10) de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}daño acerado{/g}, que ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of each of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, they will suffer ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, which ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del objetivo, le inflige <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}letalidad{/g} / 10)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}daño acerado{/g}, que ignora la {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}.

languages.text: ターゲットの各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を無視する({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g} / 10)の{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of each of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, they will suffer ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, which ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ターゲットの各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}を無視する<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g} / 10)</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}裂傷ダメージ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Hedef, her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} başlangıcında, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırhı{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırmayı{/g} yok sayan ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}öldürücülük{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}yırtma hasarına{/g} maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of each of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, they will suffer ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g}, which ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
